archimate:Goal.name: Non-Critical
archimate:Goal.documentation: Availability (per calendar month) 99.95% (21.56 minutes per month) Reliability 2 unplanned outages per year Recovery Time Objective Service RTO: 2 hours Support Desk 8:00am â€“ 5:30pm Monday to Friday, 52 weeks per year excluding national holidays Incident Priorities Total Failure = Priority 2 Partial Failure = Priority 3
